name: Cisco | IOSXR | Config | Config Changed (SYSLOG)
description: RP/0/RSP0/CPU0:Oct 19 20:29:37.103 : config[65891]: %MGBL-CONFIG-6-DB_COMMIT : Configuration committed by user 'cisco'. Use 'show configuration commit changes 1000000783' to view the changes.

patterns.value_re: %MGBL-CONFIG-6-DB_COMMIT : Configuration committed by user '(?P<user>.+)'. Use 'show configuration commit changes (?P<changeset>\d+)' to view the changes.

description: %L2-BM-5-MLACP_ITEM_LOCAL_MISCONFIGURATION : Node id misconfiguration detected, disabling IG 1.

name: Cisco | IOSXR | Config | Invalid Config #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %L2-BM-6-MEMBER_COMPATIBILITY : Interface GigabitEthernet0/1/0/6 in Bundle-Ether5 is incompatible with the bundle operational state; link is not using LACP but bundle is running mLACP

patterns.value_re: %L2-BM-6-MEMBER_COMPATIBILITY : Interface .+ is incompatible with the .+ operational state

name: Cisco | IOSXR | Config | Config Corrected #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %L2-BM-6-MEMBER_COMPATIBILITY : Interface GigabitEthernet0/1/0/6 in Bundle-Ether5 is no longer incompatible with the bundle operational state

patterns.value_re: %L2-BM-6-MEMBER_COMPATIBILITY : Interface .+ is no longer incompatible with the .+ operational state
